headline.main: Millennials Reconnect the Cable Cord as Children Arrive

snippet: About 80 percent of millennials with their own homes who have started families subscribe to cable television, and an additional 14 percent get TV with an antenna, according to Nielsen.
lead_paragraph: About 80 percent of millennials with their own homes who have started families subscribe to cable television, and an additional 14 percent get TV with an antenna, according to Nielsen.
